title: Marketing and Product Considerations for MINGAR
description:
A statistical analysis project for a company that is facing issues with their
product. This is simulated project, where our consultancy, The Outliers was
approached by a company, MINGAR and they wanted to gain insight regarding
their current customer and some issues with their products. In this project,
the analysis involved t-tests, various data wrangling techniques, 
and generalized linear and mixed models.

title: Regression Analysis About Engines & CO2 Emissions
description:
This analysis explores the relationship between Car Engines and CO2 Emissions 
through the utilization of Exploratory Data & Regression Analysis and employs
techniques such as t-tests, ANOVA and ANCOVA tests, partial F-tests and model
selection and validation techniques.
contents: Click here to view the full article

title: Statistical Analysis About Diabetes, Sleep and Weight
description:
This analysis explores the relationship between Diabetes Sleep and Weight
through the utilization of Exploratory Data Analysis and Linear Regression
and employs techniques such as Confidence Intervals, Model Fitting, Maximum
Likelihood Estimation, Bayesian Estimates and Hypothesis Testing techniques.
